title: Katy Perry rings in birthday with a tropical bathing suit photo: '35 and never more alive'
text:
CLOSE At the Met Gala, Katy Perry revealed how heavy her chandelier outfit was, while Bella Hadid said the pop star had to come by truck. (May 7) AP, AP

Life is paradise!

Katy Perry rang in her 35th birthday on Instagram Friday with a behind-the-scenes photo of the pop singer posing beach side while shooting her new music video "Harleys In Hawaii."

In the snapshot, Perry looks red hot in a floral bathing suit with a white flower stylishly tucked behind her ear in front of sun-touched, picturesque waves.

"35 and never more alive," she captioned the image.

The music video for "Harleys In Hawaii" was released last week, filled with stunningly tropical visuals of Perry in the Aloha State. She revealed that the song was inspired by her time in Hawaii with fiancé Orlando Bloom while shooting "American Idol."

'Good for her': Paula Abdul weighs in on Katy Perry’s rumored ‘American Idol’ salary

"We rented a Harley because we were just there for a few days," Perry said on the "Zach Sang Show" in July. "To be on the back of a motorcycle in Hawaii and just let the air flow on your face. It’s so beautiful. It was awesome. But I can remember specifically where I was, the street corner I was at in Oahu and turning that corner and whispering to Orlando, going 'I'm going to write a song called 'Harleys In Hawaii.' And I did."

Orlando popped the question to Perry during a helicopter ride on Valentine's Day in February with a floral-inspired diamond ring.

He gushed about his future wife on Instagram in August, writing, "So grateful to share this bright light @katyperry. Makes all the difference having a partner to enjoy the highs, lows and everything in between."

This is the second marriage for both Perry and Bloom. She was married to comedian Russell Brand from 2010 to 2012. Bloom was married to model Miranda Kerr from 2010 to 2013, sharing one child, Flynn, age 8.
